import React from "react"; import "./selectmenu.css"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Card, CardBody, Container, FormGroup } from "reactstrap"; function SelectionMenu() { const [showtext, setShowtext] = useState(false); const handletextSite=(e)=>{ const getsite = e.target.value; console.log(getsite); } const handletextPartner=(e)=>{ const getpartner = e.target.value; console.log(getpartner); } return (
); } export default SelectionMenu
